name: mris_copy_header
author: FreeSurfer Developers
description: Tool to copy the header from a template surface to an input surface and save as the output surface.

inputs.description: Input surface file whose header will be replaced.
inputs.name: Input Surface

inputs.description: Template surface file from which the header will be copied.
inputs.name: Template Surface

inputs.description: Output surface file with the updated header.
inputs.name: Output Surface

output-files.description: Output surface file with copied header.
output-files.name: Output Surface
